title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-2.2 - Determination of eligibility for RMA

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-2.2 - Determination of eligibility for RMA
State Regulations
(a) In determining eligibility for RMA, the
social services district must comply with the provisions of Part 360 of this

Title governing applications, determinations of eligibility, and the furnishing
of medical assistance (including the opportunity for fair hearings) in the

State. (b) The social services
district must promptly notify the agency which provided for the initial
resettlement of a refugee whenever the refugee applies for medical
assistance. (c) The social services
district must provide timely and adequate notice, as defined in Subpart 358-2
of this Title, to an applicant or recipient to indicate that assistance has
been authorized, denied or terminated and the notice must specify clearly the
determination with respect both to medical assistance and to RMA. Notes
